snippet.title: The Settlers: History Collection | Launch Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Celebrating the 25th anniversary of the The Settlers series, all 7 games will be available as The History Collection. It will include History Editions of all seven previous Settlers games, which includes gold versions of each game with all expansions, game improvements, and optimization for modern PC systems. All seven games will also be available separately as History Editions.

#TheSettlers #Ubisoft

INCLUDED GAMES
The Settlers (1993) History Edition
The Settlers II - Veni, Vidi, Vici History Edition
The Settlers III History Edition
The Settlers IV History Edition
The Settlers - Heritage of Kings History Edition
The Settlers - Rise of an Empire History Edition
The Settlers 7 History Edition

More info on: http://www.thesettlers.com

The Settlers: History Collection | Launch Trailer | Ubisoft [NA] 
https://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
